trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows button control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo de botão de Windows.

trans-unit.source: A Button can be clicked by using the mouse, ENTER key, or SPACEBAR if the button has focus.
trans-unit.target: Um botão pode ser clicado utilizando o rato, tecla ENTER ou barra de espaço se o botão tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> to allow users to click a button by pressing the ENTER or ESC keys even if the button does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>para permitir aos utilizadores clica num botão premindo as chaves ENTER ou ESC, mesmo se o botão não tem o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.CancelButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: This gives the form the behavior of a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que o formulário o comportamento de uma caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: When you display a form using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of a button to specify the return value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando visualiza um formulário, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>método, pode utilizar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>propriedade de um botão para especificar o valor de retorno de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the button's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar o aspecto do botão.

trans-unit.source: For example, to make it appear flat for a Web look, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para fazer com que pareça simples para um aspeto da Web, defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property can also be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, which appears flat until the mouse pointer passes over the button; then the button takes on the standard Windows button appearance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade também pode ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, que aparece simples até que o ponteiro do rato passa por cima do botão; em seguida, no botão demora no aspecto de botão de Windows padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the control that has focus accepts and processes the ENTER key press, the Button does not process it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o controlo tem foco aceita e processa prima ENTER chave, o botão não processá-la.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or another button has focus, that control processes the ENTER key press instead of the accept button.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um múltiplas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>ou outro botão tem foco, que o controlo processa prima ENTER chave em vez de botão de aceitar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> displays no caption.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>não apresenta nenhuma legenda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To specify the caption text, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto da legenda, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo pelo qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> será redimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> on the base class when creating a window.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> na classe base ao criar uma janela.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this property to add extra functionality, but must first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> constructor on the base class to verify that the control continues to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: A herança de classes pode substituir esta propriedade para adicionar funcionalidades adicionais, mas tem primeiro de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>construtor na classe base para verificar que o controlo continua a funcionar corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> object on the base class when creating a window.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> objeto na classe base ao criar uma janela.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que é devolvido para o formulário principal quando o botão é clicado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> for this property is set to anything other than `None`, and if the parent form was displayed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method, clicking the button closes the parent form without your having to hook up any events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>Esta propriedade está definida como algo diferente de `None`, e se o formulário principal tiver sido apresentado através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>método, ao clicar no botão fecha o formulário principal sem ter de ligue quaisquer eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>

trans-unit.source: The form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property is then set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> of the button when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>propriedade, em seguida, está definida como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>do botão quando o botão é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a "Yes/No/Cancel" dialog box, simply add three buttons and set their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> properties to `Yes`, `No`, and `Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para criar uma caixa de diálogo "Sim/não/Cancelar", basta adicionar três botões e definir as respetivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>Propriedades `Yes`, `No`, e `Cancel`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>bits de estilo estão definidas como `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controlo e DoubleClick o evento não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> controlo com o rato.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>bits de estilo estão definidas como `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controlo e MouseDoubleClick o evento não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref> whether it is the default button so that it can adjust its appearance accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref> se é o botão predefinido para que pode ajustar o aspecto em conformidade.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the parent form to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> that it should be set as the default button and to allow it to adjust its appearance accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo formulário de principal para notificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>que deve ser definida como o botão predefinido e para permitir que para ajustar o aspecto em conformidade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a button that is the default button for a form has a thicker border than other buttons on the form.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um botão que é o botão predefinido para um formulário tem um limite thicker que outros botões no formulário.

trans-unit.source: Calling the NotifyDefault method only draws the button as a default button; it does not change its behavior.
trans-unit.target: Apenas chamar o método NotifyDefault desenha botão como um botão de predefinição; não se altera o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: To make the button behave like a default button, it must be assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar o botão comportar-se como um botão predefinido, deve ser atribuído à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is to have the appearance of the default button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão é ter o aspeto do botão de predefinição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnFontChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseUp*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMouseUp também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnTextChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnTextChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for a button.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos para um botão.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser chamado para aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caráter mnemónica.

trans-unit.source: When overriding ProcessMnemonic in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's ProcessMnemonic to ensure that basic functionality remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir ProcessMnemonic numa classe derivada, lembre-se de que chamar ProcessMnemonic a classe base para se certificar de que a funcionalidade básica permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: The mnemonic character entered.
trans-unit.target: O caráter mnemónica introduzido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mnemonic was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o mnemónica ser exigido foi processado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
